name: Communauté urbaine du Grand Reims
membership:
Member of the French Competitiveness Cluster Industries & Agro-Resources
(for more details, see http://www.iar-pole.com/?lang=en)
goal: Communauté urbaine du Grand Reims is deeply committed in the bioeconomy development at the regional level as as at the European one
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Communauté urbaine du Grand Reims has a representative as a member of the European Bioeconomy  Stakeholders' Panel
